pair.title: Add OSO inCharge device
pair.intro: Enter the generated 'Subscription Key' for your account at 'https://portal.osoenergy.no/'
pair.invalid_subscription_key: Provided subscription key is not valid

device.device_connection_expired: The subscription key for your device has expired. Go to your account at 'https://portal.osoenergy.no/' and extend it or renew it to repair the device.
